item.title: Understanding and Using ListViews in Flutter: Examples and Best Practices
item.description: What is the ListView Widget in Flutter? Listview is a widget used to display items in a sequential order. ListView is the most commonly used scrolling widget. The ListView widget in Flutter is a scrollable list of widgets. Based on the scroll direction, it displays its children, horizontally or vertically. A ListView is an example of a scrolling widget, which means that it creates a scrollable list of widgets. By default, the list scrolls vertically, but you can change the scrollDirection property to Axis.

item.title: Flutter Pro Tip: Rendering ListView inside another ListView or Column in Flutter
item.description: Introduction Welcome to our tutorial on how to render a ListView inside another ListView or Column in Flutter. If you are a Flutter developer, you may have come across situations where you want to render a ListView inside another ListView or Column in Flutter. This can be a challenging task. Sometimes, if the approach is not correct, the elements in the ListView might not be visible, or you might get while nesting ListViews.
